title: Create CricPom (KenPom clone)
description: Build cricket equivalent of KenPom basketball analytics
resolution_note: Delivered via TKT-167 (CricPom Spec) + TKT-190 (weighted cross-tournament feed). Spec: docs/research/cricpom_prototype_spec_020926_v1.md. Output: cricpom_weighted_feed.json (231 players).
